def_cn: (电视或广播的)连续剧;(报纸或杂志上的)连载小说
def_en: A serial is a story which is broadcast on television or radio or is published in a magazine or newspaper in a number of parts over a period of time.
Serial killings or attacks are a series of killings or attacks committed by the same person. This person is known as a serial killer or attacker.
